Title: Very Merry Maggie
Plot: Allison has unsettling visions about a father abusing his young son (Bryce Robinson), who in turn seeks comfort in a talking doll that may be delivering sinister messages to the child. Meanwhile, health issues rattle Joe as he takes on a looming project deadline.
GuestStars: Diane Venora, Tim Hopper, Roxanne Hart, Ramon De Ocampo, Nicholas Hormann, Olivia Sandoval, Bryce Robinson, Jasmine Jessica Anthony, Tad Griffith
